channel.title: CVE Feed for Artica PFMS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Artica PFMS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-24516|2024-09-06T14:13:21.668Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Pandora FMS Special Days component allows an attacker to use it to steal the session cookie value of admin users easily with little user interaction. This issue affects Pandora FMS v767 version and prior versions on all platforms.
